body: Welp one word " G A E "
In a funny yet fucked up way, the boss is now gay for his employee. Lol, sooner or later, he will want to remain a woman and hatch a scheme to be with him. A good 8 out of 10.
I swear I read this one before. Alright so tg wasn't with consent, tg changed sexuality maybe and the other party was unaware. Perhaps a bit of coercion, but everything felt "consent" so 8.5/10.
his work wrong and to fix it he keep working overtime for free all the time but still keeps messing things up.* xD

So in short, employee keeps messing up and doing his work right so to fix it he works over time for free all the time. Boss goes and for some reason becomes really worried about his employee and eventually turns into a girl and fucks him to boost his confidant and then even does his job for him. The end
Um the scenes  were nice. I don’t know what to say about the boss though
Very fun, but doesn't this mean that the boss is gay?
Yoooo this aint half bad nice stuff
